translations: 学科；科目；主题；被试者（subject 的复数）
使服从；使经受；提交（subject 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: The two subjects are closely connected.
Students will normally take three A2 subjects.
sentences.translation: 学生通常要选三门A2证书考试科目。

sentences.sentence: She took six subjects at O level.
sentences.translation: 她参加了六门课程的普通证书考试。
